elems.desc: Critically ill patient, with normal renal funtion, community acquired intra-abdominal infection
IF high risk of Enterococci (immunocompromised or recent antibiotic exposure)
Ampicillin 2 g 6-hourly if the patients are not being treated with PIPE/TAZO or IMIPENEM/CILASTIN
If beta-lactam ALLERGY: consider as in non critically ill patients
* an increase of 2 points or more in the Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA) score
